alert.note: Alert for Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 6:47PM EDT until April 06 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GEORGETOWN AND SOUTHWESTERN WILLIAMSBURG COUNTIES... At 647 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trio, or 18 miles south of Kingstree, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Trio, Salters, Earle, Gourdin, Lane and Greeleyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
